entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 78
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1995-1229 Marriages Ceremony, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1995.
The event has as well 3 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, May 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, May 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 231 new Photos were uploaded to 10 Pūjas as follows (128 high resolutions, 103 medium resolutions, and 0 low resolution).
(i) 1981-0126 Śhrī Lakṣhmī-Viṣhṇu Pūjā,: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1981.
(ii) 1988-1208 Pūjā: 24 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(iii) 1988-1217 Pūjā: 7 high resolutions and 70 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(iv) 1988-1220 Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(v) 1988-1225 Christmas Pūjā: 10 high resolutions and 33 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1988.
(vi) 1990-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 13 high resolution uploaded, link Australia 1990.
(vii) 1990-1217 Śhrī Chakra and Śhrī Lalitā Chakra Pūjā: 16 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1990-12-15 to 21.
(viii) 1990-1221 Śhrī Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā: 14 high resolution uploaded, link India 1990-12-15 to 21.
(ix) 1990-1225 Christmas Pūjā: 27 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1990-12-22 to 31.
(x) 1991-0101 New Year Pūjā: 13 high resolution uploaded, link India 1991-01.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
